semantics.label: Player mode
semantics.description: Select the layout of the player.

semantics.label: Enable controls
semantics.description: Controls allow the user to for instance pause the audio

semantics.label: Enable autoplay
semantics.description: With autoplay the audio starts to play immediately. Do note that this is not supported by all browsers.

semantics.label: Audio not supported message
semantics.default: Your browser does not support this audio
